paper_abstract: In this paper, we deal with the existence of solutions and the periodicity character of the following systems of rational difference equations with order two x(n+1) = x(n)y(n-1)/y(n-1)+/- y(n) , y(n+1) = y(n)x(n-1)/x(n-1)+/- x(n) where the initial conditions x-1, x(0), y-1 and yo are nonzero real numbers.
paper_title: On the solutions and periodic nature of some systems of rational difference equations
